meanings.sent1: Each student worked on their project individually.
meanings.sent2: The toys were placed individually on the shelves.
meanings.sent3: The colorful candies were individually wrapped in shiny paper.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky shone individually, creating a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent5: The individual flowers in the garden added a unique touch to the landscape.

meanings.definition: Done or carried out by one person
meanings.sent1: She completed the task individually without any help.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted the masterpiece individually, showcasing their talent.
meanings.sent3: The chef prepared each dish individually, ensuring perfection.
meanings.sent4: The athlete's success was achieved individually through hard work.
meanings.sent5: The detective solved the case individually, using their sharp mind.

meanings.definition: In a way that relates to a single person or thing
meanings.sent1: He prefers to work individually rather than in a team.
meanings.sent2: The singer performed the song individually, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed individually at each family member for attention.
meanings.sent4: The raindrops fell individually, creating a soothing sound.
meanings.sent5: The leaves rustled individually in the gentle breeze.
